class.rdfs:comment: A sub-grouping of steps in the instructions for how to achieve a result (e.g. steps for making a pie crust within a pie recipe).
class.rdfs:label: HowToSection

schema:steps.rdfs:comment: The steps in the form of a single item (text, document, video, etc.) or an ordered list with HowToStep and/or HowToSection items.
schema:steps.rdfs:label: steps
